typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'delta2') ~> source1
source1 derive(ReverseTitle = reverse(title)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'delta2',
	truncate: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie','title'],
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title = ReverseTitle,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
